description.en: Yoshida was swiftly rejected by his crush of 5 years. On his way home after drinking his sorrows away, he saw a high school girl sitting on the street. "I'll let you do it with me, so let me stay". "Don't even joke about something like that". And so, the story of living with the high school girl Sayu began. The slice-of-life romance story between a runaway high school girl and a 26 year old salaryman ensues.
description.es: Yoshida fue rápidamente rechazado por su amor de 5 años. En su camino a casa después de consumir sus penas, vio a una chica de secundaria sentada en la calle. "Te dejaré hacerlo conmigo, así que déjame quedarme". "No bromees con algo así". Y así comenzó la historia sobre la convivencia con la chica de secundaria, Sayu. La romántica historia de la vida entre una colegiala fugitiva y un asalariado de 26 años comienza.
description.fr: Après l’avoir aimée pendant cinq ans, Yoshida est rejeté par sa supérieure. En rentrant chez lui après avoir bu pour oublier sa tristesse, il tombe sur une lycéenne assise par terre. « Je te laisserai le faire avec moi, si tu me laisses rester chez toi. » « Ne dis pas des choses comme ça, même pour plaisanter. » C’est ainsi que commence l’histoire de Sayu la lycéenne fugueuse avec Yoshida, un employé banal de 26 ans.
description.ru: Йошиду поспешно отвергла девушка, в которую он был влюблён 5 лет. Утопив своё горе в алкоголе, по дороге домой он встречает старшеклассницу на улице. "Я разрешу вам сделать это со мной, так что позвольте мне остаться у вас". "Даже шутить не смей о чём-то подобном". Так и началась эта история про жизнь с старшеклассницей Саю. Повседневная романтическая комедия между сбежавшей из дома старшеклассницей и 26-летним служащим.
description.pt-br: Desolado e bêbado, Yoshida, um empregado de 26 anos, deparou-se com uma estudante do ensino médio que havia saído de casa quando voltou do bar. "Ei você. JK O que diabos você está fazendo aqui? Vá para casa agora. "Tio, me deixe ficar em sua casa esta noite. Você podemos fazer "isso" se me deixar ficar." "Se você disse em tom de brincadeira, não é engraçado." "Não estou brincando. Está tudo bem por mim." "Então deixe-me dizer-lhe, não tenho interesse em pirralhas." "Hmm? Então, apenas me deixe ficar".

description.en: After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

description.en: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
description.es: Zagan es temido como un mago malvado, es torpe y tiene una lengua afilada, y una vez más tuvo que acabar con unos ladrones que invadieron su territorio cuando estaba investigando esa mañana. En una oscura subasta, encuentra a una esclava elfa blanca, Nephie, que posee una belleza sin igual. Enamorado de ella a primera vista, utiliza su fortuna para comprarla, pero tan pobre como es socialmente, no entiende cómo relacionarse con ella. Así comienza la torpe convivencia del mago que no sabe transmitir su amor y la esclava que suspira por su amo pero no sabe cómo planteárselo.
description.fr:
Zagan est craint comme mage démoniaque, un jour au marché noir il rencontre une esclave elfe du nom de Nephie. De part sa beauté innocente, il tombe sous son charme et décide de l'acheter. Bien que fortuné d'argent, ses compétences sociales ne le sont pas et il a du mal à savoir comment créer une relation…  
  
C'est parti pour une cohabitation maladroite entre ce maître qui ne sait montrer son amour et cette esclave qui en pince pour lui sans savoir quoi faire.
description.pt: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.

description.en:
A young man who gets into a plane crash while returning from a business trip overseas is reincarnated into another world after being asked by the goddess to defeat the evil god.   
  
However, he was reincarnated as a stupid prince who is known among the aristocrats as the "Pig Prince (Orc Prince)" because of his fat and ugly appearance. If you can't even do one sit-up, how are you going to defeat the evil god? This is the story of the Pig Prince's struggle to lose weight!  
  


---
description.id:
Seorang pemuda yang mengalami kecelakaan pesawat saat pulang dari perjalan binis di luar negeri direinkarnasi ke dunia lain setelah diminta oleh dewi untuk mengalahkan dewa jahat.   
  
Akan tetapi, ia tereinkarnasi sebagai seorang pangeran bodoh. yang terkenal di kalangan ningrat dengan julukan "Pangeran Orc/Pangeran Babi" karena penampilannya yang gendut dan jelek. Sit-up saja tidak bisa, apalagi mengalahkan dewa jahat? Inilah kisah perjuangan si Pangeran Babi dalam menurunkan berat badan!

description.en:
Yin Susu couldn't believe that she was reborn again, her life was repeating again, the setting was the same, the painful things were the same.

She thought that she would just become a salted fish,* living a lazy life, waiting for death, waiting for everything to end, for the female lead to die, which would mean the end of everything, but she did not want to accept her fate!

"If you, the female lead, has a golden hand, then I will break that golden hand."

*salted fish: metaphor of a corpse or a person who doesn't want to do anything.

Assuming the guise of a student, he started to investigate events from over a decade ago to unravel the truth. Jiao Xifan's quest for truth takes an unexpected turn as he fell into a trap unbeknownst to him when he befriended his classmate, Xue Zhi.

description.en:
"Why doesn't anybody remember the true world…!"  
The great war between the five races over the world ended when the Hero Sid led humanity to victory. A young soldier named Kai watched as that world was suddenly overwritten before his eyes. In the rewritten world, Sid never existed. Humanity had lost. There, dragons and demons ruled the world. Kai was forgotten by everyone around him.  
However, after encountering the mysterious girl Rinne, Kai decides to break this rewritten destiny. In a world without a hero, he inherits the hero's sword and martial arts and challenges the mighty enemy races in power. Thus begins the quest of one boy, forgotten by the world, to take back the future!
description.pt-br: "Por que ninguém se lembra do mundo verdadeiro...!" A época em que a grande corrida das cinco tribos competindo pela hegemonia no solo terminou com a vitória da humanidade liderada pelo herói Sid. No entanto, o mundo foi de repente "sobrescrito " na frente de um menino chamado Kai. No mundo reescrito, Kai viu a cena onde os seres humanos perderam para as cinco tribos por causa da ausência de herói Sid. Aqui dragões e demônios dominam o solo, e Kai é uma existência esquecida por todos os seres humanos. No entanto, depois de encontrar a misteriosa menina Rinne, Kai decide quebrar este destino reescrito. Em um mundo sem heróis, ele herda a espada do herói e a arte marcial e desafia as raças inimigas poderosas que reinam.

Once upon a time, a Demon King named Rchimedes caused havoc and destruction in the Human World. He was sealed away by the great hero Creasion, and peace returned to the world.

title.en: I Failed to Divorce My Husband

altTitles.ko: 흑막 남편과의 이혼에 실패한 것 같다

altTitles.ko-ro: Heungmang Nampyeongwaui Ihone Silpaehan Geon Gatda

altTitles.en: My Failing Divorce
I Am Afraid I Have Failed to Divorce My Husband

altTitles.fr: Je n'ai pas réussi à divorcer de mon (vilain) mari

altTitles.pt: Falhei em me divorciar do meu esposo

altTitles.ja: 黒幕夫に惚れられました

description.en:
I've been reincarnated as the extra character who stalked her husband, the male lead, for 10 years and died. Of course, I tried to divorce him before the female lead appeared.

But, I found out that my young husband was secretly abused in the house. At that moment, I immediately became overwhelmed with the responsibility and sense of duty a modern adult would have. 

**

Aiden had his back turned away from her and suddenly grabbed her arm forcefully. The strength of his hands alone could have ripped her arms off. Erin timidly called his name and spoke. 

"I already reminded you yesterday. We're a married couple, so I'm always on your side." 

"..."

"So, everything is alright." 

She comforted him with these sweet words like it was a spell. And as if he was under her magic, Aiden stopped trembling. 

**

The adult Erin requested to divorce her husband Aiden before the female lead appeared. As soon as those words left her lips, Aiden's smile disappeared. 

"A divorce? Never."

Aiden tore the divorce papers into such thin sheets, the contents were no longer legible. Erin smiled at the sight. (Synopsis source: Gourmet Scans)

---
Ellen's plan is simple. Before turning into an obsessive villain who gets executed, she's going to get a divorce! But after she becomes Ellen Lianster, her plan gets complicated. Her new husband, Aiden, has developed a debilitating fear of being touched, and Ellen is determined to discover the cause and cure. As she finds ways to help him, an affection-deprived Aiden slowly begins to seek comfort from Ellen. With both hearts opening up to each other, can this marriage succeed... at failing?
description.fr: J'ai été réincarnée en tant que la figurante qui a harcelé son mari, le rôle masculin principal, pendant 10 ans et qui est morte. Bien sûr, j'ai essayé de divorcer avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Mais j'ai découvert que la nounou de mon jeune mari abusait secrètement de lui. À ce moment-là, j'ai immédiatement été submergée par la responsabilité et le sens du devoir d'un adulte moderne. *** Aiden, qui lui tournait le dos, lui a soudainement saisi le bras avec force. La seule force de ses mains aurait pu lui arracher les bras. Erin l'appela timidement et prit la parole. «Je te l'ai déjà rappelé hier. Nous sommes un couple marié, alors je suis toujours de ton côté.» «...» «Alors, tout va bien.» Elle le réconforta avec ces mots doux comme s'il s'agissait d'un sortilège. Et comme s'il était sous sa magie, Aiden cessa de trembler. *** Erin, adulte, a demandé le divorce à son mari Aiden avant que le personnage principal féminin n'apparaisse. Dès que ces mots ont quitté ses lèvres, le sourire d'Aiden a disparu. «Un divorce? Jamais.» Aiden a déchiré les papiers du divorce en feuilles si fines que le contenu n'était plus lisible. Erin sourit à cette vue.

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

altTitles.en: Elves are Waiting for the Night

altTitles.ja: 四姉妹は夜をおまちかね

altTitles.zh-hk: 精靈四姐妹夜夜待笙歌

altTitles.ja: 四姉妹（エルフ）は夜をおまちかね

altTitles.en: The Four Sisters (Elves) Wait For The Night

description.en: Who will you “play” with tonight—? A sweet and sugary harem romantic comedy about sleeping with elves ♡

altTitles.ja: 怨み屋本舗

altTitles.en: Uramiya Honpo

description.en:
The world is filled with cruel scum, ranging from petty thieves to sociopath maniacs. When a vile low-life inflicts pain and suffering on innocent victims, sometimes their anger becomes overwhelming. Whether their damage stems from romance, finance, reputation or even a death, these victims feel trapped in their own skins and lives. 

Those victims who can't stand it anymore call for the mysterious woman Houjou Shiori, owner of Uramiya, the "Revenge Shop". 

The Uramiya specializes in executing revenge schemes. The vengeance their customers request on their bitterly resented enemies could range from financially destroying them, to smearing their social reputation, to even taking their lives. As long as you pay a fair price, the Uramiya will guarantee you get the revenge you deserve.

altTitles.ja: フェアウェイの声をきかせて

altTitles.en: Let Me Hear From Fairways

altTitles.zh: 让我听听平坦球道的声音吧

description.en: Hiyori Hinamori is practicing her golf game at a driving range. Next to her, she meets Eirin Kotori, who hits an outrageous shot with one hand...? Hinamori, who has never known the sky, creates a whirlwind in the world of high school girls' golf with Kotori.
description.ja: 練習場でゴルフの練習に励む雛守日和。その隣で片手でとんでもないショットを打つ小鳥遊衣鈴と出逢い…!? 空を知らない雛鳥が地を這った小鳥と共に、高校女子ゴルフ界に旋風を巻き起こす！

altTitles.vi: Sứa không thể bơi trong đêm

altTitles.en: Jellyfish Can't Swim in the Night

altTitles.ja: 夜のクラゲは泳げない

description.en: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.

title.en: Sono Hada no Atsusa wo Oboeteru

altTitles.ja: その肌の熱さをおぼえてる

description.en: “What would you do if I told you your partner that day was ‘me’?” Gen, a hairdresser, has long been in love with his older childhood friend, Koutarou, who likes his older brother, Kanade. One night, Gen spends the night at a hotel with a drunken Koutarou, bolstered by the thought that he might have a chance. However, Koutarou mistakenly thinks it was his older brother, Kanade, that he slept with. Gen’s used to being mistaken as Kanade, but they felt each other’s heat– to think he was mistaken as him even at night–. A devoted, younger, handsome hairdresser x a naturally airheaded, devilish, older, plain-faced boy’s one-sided, childhood love!

title.en: Soredemo Shutter no Oto wa Naru

altTitles.ja: それでもシャッターの音は鳴る

altTitles.ja-ro: Sore demo Shutter no Oto wa Naru

altTitles.en: Even So, the Shutter Will Keep On Clicking

description.en:
Hino is a perfectionist photographer. Because of his strictness, his assistant cameraman quit today. As an awkward atmosphere prevails at the site, a young man, Mitsuo, suddenly appears and says, “I'd like to be your assistant.” Inspired by his free-spirited and carefree personality, Hino gradually became more comfortable around him. But just when things are starting to go well at work, he discovers Mitsuo's secret...?

“Do you love photography?”

Even though they don’t want it, and even though they hate it, they still keep clicking the shutter in search of an answer.

title.en: Zettai BL ni Naru Sekai vs. Zettai BL ni Naritakunai Otoko

altTitles.en: A World Where Everything Definitely Becomes BL vs. The Man Who Definitely Doesn't Want To Be In A BL

altTitles.ja: 絶対BLになる世界VS絶対BLになりたくない男

altTitles.en: A Man Who Defies The World of BL

description.en: One day, the protagonist realizes that he lives inside a BL (Boys' Love) world. As he likes girls, he fights back against any hot guys that might draw near, but this is a BL world... he's still assailed with the sight of people in lovey-dovey situations one after another!

title.en: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.ja: センパイ！わざとじゃないんです！

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai! Waza to ja Nai n desu!

altTitles.en: Senpai! I Didn't Do It on Purpose!

description.en:
Sachi, a high school student, is confessed to by her love Jun, a senior who is a year older than her, and they are finally going out! However, as soon as she realizes that she is in love with Jun, Sachi has a constitution that causes her to have accidental pervert incidents with him every chance she gets! When Sachi tries to hold his hand for the first time, she accidentally puts her hand down his pants and she ends up deeply misunderstanding Jun when he asks her to pull out her hand. 

It's a sexy cute☆romantic comedy!
description.ja: 女子高生・幸は一学年上の憧れの先輩・純に告白されて、晴れて付き合えることに！ ところが両思いになった途端、幸は純に対して事あるごとにラッキースケベを起こしてしまう体質になってしまい…！? はじめて手を握ろうとしたら、勢いあまって彼のズボンに手を突っ込んでしまい違うものを握ってしまったり、あまつさえ手を抜こうとしたら手で抜こうとしてしまったりする、そんな一組のカップルが織りなすエロカワ☆ラブコメディです。
description.ru: Старшеклассница Сати наконец начинает встречаться с Дзюном, парнем который старше её на год. Она первая призналась, а теперь каждый раз, когда её переполняют чувства любви, богатые формы так и норовят создать неловкую ситуацию! Первая попытка Сати взяться за руки, случайно превращается в нырок в штаны Дзюна, оставляя его в полном недоумении. Встречайте эро-кавай ☆ лавком мангу!

title.en: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica - Mami Tomoe's Everyday Life

altTitles.ja: 巴マミの平凡な日常

description.ja: Mami Tomoe's Everyday Life is a slice-of-life featuring a lonely, single, 30-year old Mami Tomoe. It is a remake of the author's original doujinshi series, Mami Tomoe 1X Years Later Mami-san Around 30 Years Old Collection.

altTitles.en: OSO

altTitles.ja: オンリーセンス・オンライン

description.en: Utilizing a system called "Sense," each player aims to create their unique character in the VRMMORPG "Only Sense Online." Joining this realm is Yun, an absolute beginner in the world of gaming, equipped with some of the worst customized "Sense" ever. While his two sisters, both veterans in this world, criticize his choices of equipment, he continues to delve into the skill sets he has acquired. Along his way, he meets the art of "production" and people that have mastered this art. Watch as a total novice creates a revolution in the gaming world and create the "ultimate" support class.
description.fr: À l’aide d’un système appelé « Sens », chaque joueur crée son propre personnage « unique » dans le nouveau VRMMORPG « Only Sense Online ». Faites la connaissance de Yun, novice dans le monde des jeux vidéos, équipé des pires « Sens » possibles. Ses sœurs, des habituées de ce monde, critiquent ses choix d’équipement, mais sur son chemin, Yun rencontrera des maîtres dans l’art de l’artisanat. Suivez les aventures de Yun qui de novice absolu, révolutionne le monde d’OSO en devenant le « Support » ultime !

title.en: THE iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls - Daremasu Battle Royale (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: I Wanted to be Hurt by Love
You Loved Me So Much It Hurt

altTitles.ru: Я хотела бы быть обиженной твоей любовью

altTitles.ja: 君に愛されて痛かった

description.en:
Kanae is a girl who is struggling to fit in with the popular clique at her high school. Because she had been bullied in middle school, she has developed an acute inferiority complex that had led her to engage in questionable after-school activities in order to feel wanted.   
  
In comes Hiroshi, a high-school baseball star who became drawn to her after finding her crying during a group date at a karaoke bar. Thus begins an unhealthy relationship between a mentally unstable high-school girl and a jock.  


---
description.pt: Kanae é uma garota que está lutando pra se encaixar no grupo popular de sua escola. Devido ao bullying que sofreu durante o ensino fundamental, ela desenvolveu um intenso complexo de inferioridade, o que a levou a praticar atividades questionáveis depois das aulas, tudo para sentir-se desejada.

altTitles.ja: アイビー

title.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: 100 Ghost Stories to Die For
Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death

description.en:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

altTitles.ja: 寄生列島

description.en: Sendo Chihiro, a high school girl, moves from Tokyo to the provincial island of Hanayama after her parents' divorce. There's something strange about the island she moves to. There is blatant discrimination against outsiders, mysterious rituals that suddenly take place, and a huge "water tower" built in the middle of the island... One day, a fisherman is stabbed to death in his home. The whole island becomes suspicious of the murderer, and the unexpected culprit is revealed――. A parasite psycho-thriller by Edogawa Edogawa of "Ikenie Touhyou".

During a big campus carnival, five people escaped to the beach to play a card game.
Lin Weixia then got the chance to ask Ban Sheng a question.

Lin Weixia: "What do you want to be?"
Ban Sheng: "A shark." He then paused and asked, "What about you?"
"A fish tank." she answered.

Everyone knows that sharks and fish tanks can never be together.

The handsome and arrogant boy × the cold and cool academic girl.

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!

title.en: The Tough Life of a Journalist

description.en:
In the interview room, they spoke of a warm world and justice, but in the end, a newspaper company is still a company, and a company is just that. Starting the day at 5G speed but ending it at 3G, Weekend work is a given, and being on-call is an option. The more incidents and accidents, the more work piles up, So I wish for world peace now more than ever. Yet when I see the numbers in my bank account, all I feel is sadness. This is the story of a realistic journalist living in a world full of inevitable things. Even so, the “clickbait journalist” and “corporate worker,” Who wander with hope, hoping to improve even just a little, Find themselves constantly torn between two worlds. The cat reporter, caught in the middle,
Heads to work again today, stumbling along the way.
description.ko:
면접장에서는 따뜻한 세상과 정의를 외쳤지만,
결국 신문사도 회사고 회사는 회사였다.
출근은 5G인데 퇴근은 3G,
주말 출근은 기본에 당직은 옵션.

사건사고가 많으면 일이 늘어나니
그 어느 때보다 세상의 평화를 바란다.

그럼에도 통장에 찍히는 숫자를 보면 슬픔뿐.
그렇게 어쩔 수 없는 것들로
가득한 세상에서 벌어지는 현실적인 기자 이야기.

그래도 조금이라도 더 나아지고 싶어 하는
희망으로 헤매는 ‘기레기’와 ‘회사원’,
그 어느 중간에서 끊임없이 고민하며 살아가는
고양이 기자는 오늘도 좌충우돌 출근을 한다.

altTitles.en: Boarding School Juliet

altTitles.ja: 寄宿学校のジュリエット

description.en: Juliet Persia and Inuzuka Romio are archenemies. They lead two high school dormitories from two rivaling countries. Both factions are dead set on defeating the other to gain control over the island they have to share. Beneath the feuding exterior, however, Persia and Inuzuka long for love and peace for their budding relationship…
description.it:
Juliet Persia e Romio Inuzuka sono a capo di due dormitori rivali presso l'accademia privata Dahlia, in cui risiedono gli studenti appartenenti a due paesi differenti, i "Black Doggy" e i "White Cat". Le due fazioni sono in guerra tra loro per contendersi il controllo dell'isola in cui vivono. Juliet e Romio si dimostrano agli occhi dei loro compagni di dormitorio come acerrimi nemici, ma in realtà sono segretamente innamorati l'uno dell'altra e costretti a mantenere nascosta la loro relazione per non subire ripercussioni.  
  
  
 **Links:**   
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/3628803)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/yousukekaneda)
description.ru:
История проходит в школе-интернате Далия, престижной школе на изолированном острове, где учатся студенты из Восточной страны и Западного княжества. Враждебные отношения соседних стран не меняются и внутри школы — день изо дня между учениками происходят стычки из-за взаимной неприязни. К этой и без того напряжённой ситуации добавляется то, что Ромио Инудзука, лидер первокурсников из общежития Восточной страны, известного как «Чёрные собаки», и Джульетта Персия, лидер первокурсников из общежития Западного княжества, известного как «Белые кошки», тайно влюблены друг в друга!
Об этих отношениях, невзирая ни на какие обстоятельства, абсолютно никто не должен узнать!

altTitles.ja-ro: Sasayaku you ni Koi o Utau

altTitles.ja: ささやくように恋を唄う

altTitles.pt-br: Sussurrando Uma Canção De Amor Para Você

altTitles.en: Whispering You a Love Song

description.en: Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and, to Himari’s surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what “love” really means…
description.es: Himari comienza la escuela secundaria y en su primer día atiende el concierto del club de música ligera en el gimnasio de la escuela, enamorándose a primera vista con la cantante Yori y confesándole su amor en los casilleros de zapatos. Buscándo a dicha cantante, Himari se entera de que Yori no es parte del mencionado club y que a ella le gusta tocar música sola en la terraza de la escuela. Allí, se entera de que Yori también se enamoró de ella.
description.fr: Himari est une lycéenne de première année qui, dès le premier jour, assiste à la représentation du club de musique au gymnase de l'école. Elle a eu le coup de foudre pour la chanteuse Yori, à qui elle s'est déclarée devant les casiers du lycée. En cherchant ledit élève plus tard, elle découvre qu'elle ne fait pas vraiment partie du club et qu'elle aime jouer de la musique seule sur le toit. Là, elle découvre que Yori aussi est tombée amoureuse d'elle.
description.ru:
Химари влюбилась в солистку группы, которая выступала на приветственной вечеринке новых студентов. После разговора с Химари Ёри — солистка группы — поняла, что влюбилась в неё с первого взгляда...

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://readmanga.io/proshepchu_tebe_pesniu_o_liubvi__A5238))
description.uk: Життєрадісна, енергійна старшокласниця Хімарі по вуха закохалася у свого семпая, на ім'я Йорі після того, як почула виступ її групи першого дня навчання. Хімарі відразу зізнається Йорі у своїх почуттях і на подив Хімарі, Йорі каже, що вона теж закохана в неї! Але коли Хімарі розуміє, що вони відчувають два різні види кохання, вона починає ставити собі питання, що ж насправді означає "любов".
description.es-la: "Whispering you a love song" es la historia de un amor a primera vista que inicia en la temporada de los cerezos en flor. Himari, una nueva estudiante de la preparatoria, queda fascinada por Yori-senpai, la vocalista de la banda de chicas que se presenta en la ceremonia de inauguración del año escolar.
description.pt-br: Himari é uma caloura do ensino médio que no primeiro dia assiste a apresentação do clube de música light na academia da escola, apaixonando-se pelo veterano e cantor Yori à primeira vista, confessando-se a ela nos armários dos sapatos. Mais tarde, procurando pelo dito veterano, Himari descobre que Yori não faz parte do clube e que, em vez disso, gosta de tocar música sozinha no telhado. Lá, ela descobre que Yori também se apaixonou por ela.

title.ja: Silent Witch Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto

altTitles.ja: サイレント・ウィッチ 沈黙の魔女の隠しごと

altTitles.en: Secrets of the Silent Witch
Silent Witch

description.en:
Monica Everett is revered as “The Silent Witch.” She’s the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she’s just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the “Seven Sages,” and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

The antisocial young prodigy will have to hide her true nature while secretly rescuing the prince from encroaching danger in this thrilling fantasy story!
description.es:
Monica Everett es venerada como «La Bruja Silenciosa». Es la única maga del mundo que puede usar la magia sin conjuros... En realidad, es tímida: ¡la única razón por la que practicaba magia sin encantamientos era para no tener que hablar en público! Antes incluso de darse cuenta de su propio talento, Mónica es elegida como uno de los «Siete Sabios», ¿y se le asigna la misión secreta de proteger al segundo príncipe del reino...?

La antisocial joven prodigio tendrá que ocultar su verdadera naturaleza mientras rescata en secreto al príncipe del peligro que la acecha en esta emocionante historia de fantasía.
description.id: Keajaiban tidak membutuhkan nyanyian. Ini adalah kisah tentang penyihir terlemah, paling pemalu, namun terkuat, dan bagaimana dia dilahirkan kembali, semuanya menjadi sebuah buku. (Penyihir Keheningan) Monica Everett. Satu-satunya penyihir di dunia yang bisa menggunakan sihir diam (tanpa nyanyian), dan seorang pahlawan muda yang membunuh sendiri naga hitam legendaris itu. Tapi apa sifat aslinya?? Alasan sebenarnya saya berlatih sihir diam adalah agar saya tidak perlu berbicara di depan umum. Ketika Monica terpilih sebagai salah satu dari 7 Watchers, tanpa disadari, dia terpaksa mengambil misi rahasia untuk melindungi pangeran kedua…? Lemah dan pemalu, namun yang terkuat. Penyihir surgawi yang antisosial menyembunyikan identitas aslinya dan diam-diam membawa kejahatan ke pengadilan melawan pangeran dalam fantasi yang menyakitkan! Fantasi penyihir web, terlahir kembali menjadi sebuah buku, dengan tambahan! Apa yang akan menjadi misteri baru yang berdiri di depan Monica Everett…?

altTitles.en: Dragon Ball - Digital Colored Comics
Dragon Ball - Full Color Edition

altTitles.ja: DRAGON BALL カラー版

description.en: Goku and friends battle intergalactic evil in the greatest action-adventure-fantasy-comedy-fighting series ever! Legend has it that if all seven of the precious orbs called “Dragon Balls” are gathered together, an incredibly powerful dragon god will appear to grant one wish. Unfortunately, the orbs are scattered across the world, making them extremely difficult to collect. Enter 16-year-old Bulma, a scientific genius who has constructed a radar to detect the exact locations of the Dragon Balls. She’s on a mission to find all seven orbs, but first she must convince young Son Goku to join her on her quest. With a monkey tail, superhuman strength and a magic staff for a weapon, Son Goku is ready to set out on the adventure of a lifetime…

title.en: Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House

altTitles.ja: 舞妓さんちのまかないさん

altTitles.en: The Caterer at the Maiko Manor
The Makanai: Cooking for the Maiko House

description.en:
Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. 
After failing to become a Maiko, a traditional dance apprentice, she starts working as caterer for her troupe. 
This is the story of her daily life.  

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.

Anime: [AniDB](https://anidb.net/anime/15476) | [MAL](https://myanimelist.net/anime/41556/Maiko-san_Chi_no_Makanai-san) | [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23951) | [LC](https://www.livechart.me/anime/9863) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13884016/)
Live-action dorama: [Netflix](https://www.netflix.com/title/81325501) | [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718203-kiyo-in-kyoto) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15964848/)
 
--- 
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**
description.ja: ここは京都のど真ん中にある花街。 舞妓さんたちが深夜、お仕事を終えたあと帰ってきて、共同生活を送っているのは、「屋形」と呼ばれるおうちです。 とある屋形で「まかないさん」として舞妓さんたちに毎日の食事を作っているのは、なんと弱冠16歳の少女・キヨ。 彼女がまかないさんになったのには、ある意外な理由があって——。 華やかな花街の舞台裏、普通の日のごはんを通して、温かな人間模様が描かれます。

altTitles.ja: ヴィラン

description.en:
"I'm sure we freak them out just by holding hands" Orio Azuru is a young man who doesn't understand his gender. In this town, "he" is the freest. Midou Renri, the one he fell in love with -- or so he should have.
Brought to you by Fujita, the creator of "Wotakoi", the much famed vocaloid song "Villain" is remade into a manga overflowing with heartbreak and excitement.
How will their tale of love go in an era where we wish to see such stories?
description.ja:
「きっと手を繋ぐだけでゾッとされる。」
自分の性別がわからない少年・織生空弦(おりお あずる)はこの街で一番自由な“彼”・御堂蓮利(みどう れんり)に、恋をした---はずだった。
ボカロ史に輝く名曲にして問題作の『ヴィラン』が
ヲタ恋のふじたの手により、切なさとときめきが溢れる漫画に生まれ変わる。
今の時代だからこそ見届けてほしい、二人の恋の結末は？

title.en: Demon X Angel, Can't Get Along!

altTitles.zh: 恶魔X天使 不能友好相处

altTitles.en: Demon X Angel Can't Get Along!

altTitles.ar: ملاك و شيطان! لا يمكن ان نتعايش

altTitles.pt-br: Demônio X Anjo, Não Conseguem Se Dar Bem!

description.ar: الشياطين والملائكة نوعان من الأجناس المتقابلة مع مرور الزمن سئموا من القتال ضد بعضهم بعض ولكي يتعايشوا بسلام سويا قرروا البدء بخطة زواج! الخطة لها فترة مراقبة مدتها عام واحد. إذا كان الشيطان والملاك لا يزالان غير قادرين على العيش سويا وفهم بعضهم البعض بشكل جيد ، فسيتم إلغاء الزواج و نتيجة لذلك ، تم اختيار جيا تشينغ (الشيطان) و يو شانشان (الملاك) بواسطة اليانصيب كشريكين في الزواج ، وبدأت حياتهم سويا كزوجين يجب عليهم التعايش معا بشكل جيد.
description.en: Demons and angels are natural enemies that have grown tired of fighting each other. In order to coexist peacefully, they decided to arrange a marriage between the two races! If the pair can't get along within the one-year trial period, the marriage will be dissolved. This is how Jiacheng (Demon) and Yu Shanshan (Angel) became the chosen "lucky" pair for the marriage. Sharing the goal of divorce, the two began their lives of "happy" cohabitation!
description.pt-br: Demônios e anjos são duas raças opostas. À medida que os tempos mudam, eles estão cansados ​​de lutar. Para conviverem pacificamente, decidiram iniciar um plano de casamento! O plano tem um período de observação de um ano. Se os demônios e os anjos ainda não se derem bem, o casamento será cancelado. Como resultado, Jiacheng (demônio) e Yu Shanshan (anjo) foram “felizmente” selecionados por sorteio como parceiros de casamento, e começaram uma vida de coabitação “feliz” com o destino do divórcio.

altTitles.en: Space Heavenly Demon 3077
Cosmic Demon 3077

description.en: After countless years, the Heavenly Demon, sealed within Mount Tai, finally awakened, only to discover that humanity had long abandoned the radiation-soaked Earth and was now exploring the far reaches of the galaxy.

altTitles.en: JJBA: GL
Jojos glass lariats
Glariats

description.en: The year is 2019 in Puerto Larraín, Chile. Glass Lariats follows the story of Josefina Torres, a 17 year old teenager, on her adventure to find her sister who was kidnapped for unknown reasons. During her adventure, Josefina will fight to learn about her family history and unveil the mystery behind the man who appears in her dreams.

altTitles.en: World's End Valkyrie

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ

altTitles.en: Valkyrie of the End
Valkyrie Apocalypse

description.en:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.

---
  - Alternative English Translation: [<comikey>](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

altTitles.ja: 宇宙ファラオ☆パトラちゃん

description.en:
Let's invade Earth during summer vacation!?

I, Princess Patra of Ptolemy, chose "Earth Invasion" for my summer vacation free study!
However, because of my comfortable life on Earth, I tend to fall behind on my homework!
Today is another peaceful day♪ (Thanks to Patra-chan's love for the Earth)

altTitles.ja: 限界OLと女子大生が〇〇する話

altTitles.en: An OL at Her Limit and a College Girl

description.en: Segawa-san is the star of the office who everyone depends on. But she's stretched thin, and the state of her apartment has gotten dire. After a fateful encounter, the college student next door offers to lend a helping hand!
description.ja: 仕事ができて皆から頼られる完璧OL 瀬川さん。しかし家では、汚部屋で毎日コンビニ飯を食べる限界生活を送っていた。ある日、お隣に住む片付け上手でしっかり者の女子大生 安藤さんに部屋の片付けを手伝ってもらうことになり…？

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

altTitles.en: The Gourmet

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.ja: 真夜中の俺を見て

altTitles.vi: Dõi Theo Màn Đêm Trong Em

description.en:
Mayo, who is gloomy and lacks self-confidence, is currently active as the bright and cheerful popular VTuber "Mahiru".

The more Mahiru, the polar opposite of his true self, is loved, the more the reality of being alone becomes painful...

Even his manager Ogino, who praises him a lot and spoils him, is probably only looking at Mahiru, not the real "me".

Because he knows this, he can't take Ogino's words "I love you" seriously and wish to be loved by him so much...!

However, as if seeing through Mayo's "desire to be bullied", Ogino asks, "Shall I bully you instead?", revealing the depths of his body trembling with anticipation...!?

A sweet, sadistic, caring manager x an unconsciously masochistic, gloomy VTuber

Development of the mind and body! Pampered Love Days!!!!

altTitles.en: Trump

description.en:
Sophie, a boy with vampire and human blood, is transferred from an orphanage to an institution called Clan. The school houses vampire boys who have reached their Cocoon period, or puberty in human terms. Sophie has a fateful encounter with a boy named Ul while being coldly greeted by the vampires around him. As Ul continues to research the “power of immortality” that vampires once possessed, he learns of the existence of TRUMP, the original vampire that is said to live forever, and begins to crave eternal life.

Eventually, Sophie and Ul become entangled in the deep fate surrounding the legend of immortality...

A manga adaptation of the origin story of playwright Kenichi Suemitsu’s popular series! A Gothic school fantasy that beautifully spins the conflicts of impressionable and sensitive boysー!
description.ja: 吸血種<ヴァンプ>と人間の血が流れる少年ソフィは、養護院からクランと呼ばれる施設へと入所した。そこは繭期――人間でいうところの思春期を迎えた吸血種の少年たちが集う学園。周囲の吸血種から冷ややかな目で迎えられる中、ソフィはある一人の少年と運命的な出会いを果たす。劇作家・末満健一の人気シリーズの原点となる物語をコミック化!! 繊細かつ多感な少年たちの葛藤を美しく紡ぎ出すゴシック学園ファンタジー!
description.vi: Câu chuyện xoay quanh Sophie Anderson - một con lai giữa con người và ma cà rồng (Dhampir), bị khinh ghét vì sự không thuần khiết. Tuy vậy, Sophie vẫn vượt lên những trở ngại với trái tim cao quý và luôn đầy tự hào về dòng máu của mình.

description.pt-br: Em apenas duas páginas, a protagonista se arrepende totalmente do que disse.

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.
